metadata.description: Spells that transform and alter plants and plant products

spells.name: Transform Wood to Steel
spells.description: Transforms wooden objects into steel while retaining their original shape. The metal is as strong and durable as true steel.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (transform to metal), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Terram requisite

spells.name: Plant Growth of the Eager Sprout
spells.description: Accelerates plant growth dramatically, causing a seed to grow into a mature plant within minutes or making an existing plant grow to enormous size.

spells.name: Living Rope
spells.description: Transforms rope or vines into a snake-like creature that can move independently and follow simple commands like binding or releasing targets.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (animate plant), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Animal requisite

spells.name: Barkskin of the Oak
spells.description: Transforms a person's skin to have the texture and toughness of tree bark, providing excellent protection against physical attacks.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (transform human to plant-like), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Corpus requisite

spells.name: Rot the Wooden Beam
spells.description: Accelerates decay in wooden structures, causing them to rot and become weak within moments. Can collapse buildings or destroy weapons.

spells.name: Tree Walk
spells.description: Allows a person to merge with and travel through trees, entering one tree and emerging from another within reasonable distance.
spells.guidelines: Base 25 (merge with plants), +1 Touch, +1 Concentration, +1 Corpus requisite

spells.name: Transform Plant to Stone
spells.description: Transforms living or dead plant matter into solid stone while preserving the original shape and detail. Creates permanent stone sculptures.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (transform to mineral), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Terram requisite

spells.name: Flowering Staff
spells.description: Transforms a wooden staff or branch to continuously produce flowers, fruits, or leaves as desired, creating an ever-blooming magical item.

spells.name: Tangle of Writhing Vines
spells.description: Transforms nearby plants into aggressive, grasping vines that attempt to entangle and restrain anyone who enters the area.

spells.name: Harvest of the Seasons
spells.description: Transforms all plants in a large area to simultaneously ripen their fruits and mature their crops, creating an instant harvest.

spells.name: Wooden Blade
spells.description: Transforms wood to become as sharp and hard as steel while retaining its wooden appearance, creating deadly weapons that appear harmless.
